column4: News;Photo: Chinese State Councilor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi (R) meets with Cambodian Deputy Prime Minister Hor Namhong in Luang Prabang
column7: 2018. Namhong is here to attend the fourth Lancang-Mekong Cooperation (LMC) Foreign Ministers’ Meeting
column8: scheduled on Monday. (Xinhua/Li Gang)------Chinese State Councilor and Foreign Minister Wang Yi met here on Sunday with Cambodian Deputy Prime Minister Hor Namhong on bilateral ties with both sides vowing to enhance cooperation under the ------Belt and Road------ Initiative.------Namhong is here to attend the fourth Lancang-Mekong Cooperation (LMC) Foreign Ministers’ Meeting
column9: scheduled on Monday.------The Chinese state councilor said since the establishment of the diplomatic relations between the two countries 60 years ago
column10: China and Cambodia have always understood
column11: trusted and supported each other.------In the new era
column12: China is willing to enhance close strategic coordination and cooperation with Cambodia
column13: enrich connotation of the comprehensive strategic partnership of cooperation and foster a community of shared destiny of strategic significance
column14: Wang said.------China is willing to deepen cooperation with Cambodia under the Belt and Road Initiative
column15: increase production capacity investment and industrial parks construction
column16: and help the country improve self-driven development competence
column17: Wang said.------Cambodia is an important participant of the Lancang-Mekong Cooperation
column19: noting that China is looking forward to working with Cambodia to promote the cooperation and realize common development.------For his part
column20: Namhong said this year marks the 60th anniversary of the establishment of Cambodia-China diplomatic relations and bilateral ties have made substantial progress
column21: with frequent high-level mutual visits and fruitful pragmatic cooperation achievements.------Cambodian Prime Minister Samdech Techo Hun Sen is ready to attend the second Belt and Road Forum for International Cooperation to be held in China next year
column22: and further promote bilateral economic and trade cooperation
column23: expand investment and increase personnel exchanges
column24: he said.------The Cambodian side actively supports the Lancang-Mekong Cooperation
column25: and is willing to closely communicate with the Chinese side to push forward the mechanism to yield more positive results
